title: Quick Question about Playing Taliyah IN PBE?
body: Maybe it isn't working but i've watching people play On twitch and I was wondering how people are doing? that because when i create a private match  it doesn't go into the champion picture loading screen.

replies.body:
I'm not entirely sure I know what you mean regarding your issue.  Are you saying that you can't see Taliyah?  Or are you having a sort of tech issue where you aren't able to enter a match?

Reply back and let me know!

> [{quoted}](name=dArtagnan,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=w3wg287y,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-05-03T23:38:51.609+0000)
>
> I'm not entirely sure I know what you mean regarding your issue.  Are you saying that you can't see Taliyah?  Or are you having a sort of tech issue where you aren't able to enter a match?
> 
> Reply back and let me know!

Sorry, You see when you select (I can see her and everything) and when i lock in and the game is about to enter The Laoding screen before the game starts it doesn't do anything it kinda just sits there, after a while it'll give me an error message stating that the game has failed to launch, I guess she's bugged or something haha.

Yeah, given it is the PBE it sounds like there is an issue with that platform.  Because these are supposed to break on there, I'm not able to give any specific troubleshooting advice >.<

I hope it allows you to enter in the future! :)

> [{quoted}](name=dArtagnan,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=w3wg287y,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-05-04T00:39:22.160+0000)
>
> Yeah, given it is the PBE it sounds like there is an issue with that platform.  Because these are supposed to break on there, I'm not able to give any specific troubleshooting advice >.<
> 
> I hope it allows you to enter in the future! :)

Nah it's fine I'm sure they'll fix it haha but some other time I suppose thaanks for the Help man! :)

What you guys have for problem is : High demande toward the servers. It's Lag. There is too many people want to play Taliyah, you just better come back later or a wait 2-3 days so the hype does down :)

I'm having a similar issue trying to play a custom game with Taliyah.  I can see and select her (and lock in), but when Champ select countdown gets to 0, the game fails to start.

Almost seems like the same issue as trying to play Aurelion Sol when he was first released on PBE.
